name: Space Swap (aarchijsl)
description:
Aliens invaded the Earth and you are the only hope of the humanity to defend the Earth and save your loved ones!

Fly with your space ship around the planet and destroy aliens before they fly too close to your shields.

-Easy to learn mehanics!

-Engage your quick-thinking as the game has quite a steep level of gameplay speed!

-Enjoy glorious retro visuals with moderate colors to reflect the severity of the world in danger!

-Earn high scores!

-Swap your ship direction in a short period of time!

-Train your quick thinking!

-Engage in alien combat!
